title: Windows Service Installed from User-Writable Path
description: Detects a new Windows service installation where the binary path is in a user-writable directory.
sigma:
title: Windows Service Installed from User-Writable Path
id: RULE-007
description: Detects a new Windows service installation where the binary path is in a user-writable directory.
author: detpack-lab
status: stable
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: system
detection:
  selection:
    EventID: 7045
    ImagePath|contains: "\\Users\\"
  condition: selection
falsepositives:
  - Rare; some legitimate tools may install from user space (should be reviewed)
level: high
tags:
  - attack.t1543
  - attack.persistence
